Description.Name: C.A.S.E. LRM Ammo
Description.Details:
C.A.S.E.; Cellular Ammunition Storage Equipment Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Ammo Bins will explode and destroy their installed location when they receive a Critical Hit.

LRM Ammo Bins each contain 120 rounds and may feed multiple weapons.
